Service & Calibration

Home / Service & Calibration

Please let us organise the service & calibration of all of your surveying & safety equipment.

Certificates are issued to prove the competency of the work completed, to the correct standards expected.

This list is not comprehensive. We can service and calibrate any type of surveying or safety equipment.

Contact us on 01482 322191, provide us with the make and model of the equipment you require servicing, and we will provide a quotation before the work is completed.

If any additional work is required, we will provide a quotation before the work is completed.

There will be a £12.50 delivery and collection charge. We can arrange to have your equipment from your premises or site, making the process as convenient as we possibly can.

We can also arrange a hire instrument to cover you while the work is being completed.

All prices are subject to VAT charged at the appropriate rate.
